name: Adnventure and Stuffs
description:
Once upon a time, King Duck is kidnap by the Evil Wizard. It is our job to save him. It is not an easy task. Along the way, you will find many interesting but challenging obstacles.

However, do not worry. There is always the wizard named Wizard that will assist you many times and give you all needed equipment.
This is the game that need both strategy and some reflect skills from the player.
